name: Badminton Stores-Ecommerce-fullstack-showcase
description: A feature-rich, full-stack E-commerce platform built with Node.js, Express, React, and MySQL. Includes user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and more.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
